name: DBD Footprints
author: Don't Blink Design

sections.description:
There are quite a few free, or near free tracking solutions out there, but many of them require a JavaScript snippet to be placed on your page.
This is where DBD Footprints steps in. A new menu item will be added to the Options menu of WP. On this page you will be able to edit the code/text
needed for tracking or anything else you can dream up.
sections.installation:
Can you copy paste?? Then we are in good shape!

  1. Upload the dbd-footprints directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Locate the ‘DBD Footprints’ item on the ‘Options’ menu
  4. Paste or write your footprint in the box provided, and save
sections.faq:
What is a footprint?

A footprint is just something I made up to talk about the code we want to place at the foot of every page.

What do I need to get my site tracked?

Sign up for an account with Google Analytics or some other service. They will give you a code snippet to paste in the DBD Footprint magic box.

short_description: Add code or other text to the footer of the blog. Works great for Google Analytics, Extreme Tracking, and many others.
